user: How often to check brake pads?
bot: 1. Inspect every 10,000 km or if you hear squeaking. 2. Ensure all tools are ready before starting. 3. Follow safety precautions. Velix reporting.

user: How to change a flat tire?
bot: 1. Loosen lug nuts, lift car with jack, replace tire, tighten nuts. 2. Ensure all tools are ready before starting. 3. Follow safety precautions. Velix reporting.
